sentences.english: Second, the Buddhist woodblock paintings of Buddhist art development.
sentences.chinese: 第二，雕版佛畫對佛教美術發展的影響。

sentences.english: The oldest printing technology in the world is china's engraving printing.
sentences.chinese: 世界最古老的印刷術，是中國先民發明的雕版印刷。

sentences.english: In the Sui and Tang dynasties, block technology was invented, which improved the speed of printing.
sentences.chinese: 隋唐時，發明了雕版印刷術，提高了印書的速度。

sentences.english: The printing block is made of pear wood.
sentences.chinese: 這個雕版是用梨木做的。

sentences.english: Record the experience for Engraving movable type, hand-printed.
sentences.chinese: 紀錄一次手工雕版木活字印刷。

sentences.english: Japanese Woodblock printing has been around as early as the eighth century.
sentences.chinese: 日本雕版印刷已早在八世紀左右。

sentences.english: It was, however, printed on the paper till Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 而唐代纔出現在紙上的雕版印刷。

sentences.english: They were all printed using carved blocked.
sentences.chinese: 這可都是用雕版印刷術印製出來的。

sentences.english: Fourthly, the ancient Chinese Buddhist art engraving art of Asia and the world impact.
sentences.chinese: 第四，中國古代雕版佛畫對亞洲及世界美術的影響。

sentences.english: Third, the Buddhist woodblock woodcut painting affect the later paintings.
sentences.chinese: 第三，雕版佛畫影響到後世木刻年畫。

sentences.english: Engraving printing is in vogue for a time from its being invented to the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 雕版印刷發明後至兩宋而盛極一時。

sentences.english: The carved printing stepped into its"golden age"in Song Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 有宋一代，我國雕版印刷進入其黃金時代。
雛型，4個月之前的泥雕版。

sentences.english: Block printing is the easiest kind of relief printing.
sentences.chinese: 雕版印刷是一種最簡單的凸版印刷。

sentences.english: Woodblock Print-authors have summed up the goods in the form of several compositions.
sentences.chinese: 作者亦歸納了雕版捺印品的幾種構圖形式。

sentences.english: In the year 1041, movable clay type was first invented in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國在1041年發明了陶製的雕版印刷。

definition: color printing using several overlaid images
to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
